org.apache.derbyTesting.junit

Class NetworkServerControlWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerControlWrapper

  • public class NetworkServerControlWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class wrapping a NetworkServerControl instance, using reflection to allow TestConfiguration to be used without having derbynet.jar on the classpath.

    Only methods actually required by TestConfiguration are wrapped, and this class depends on the functionality implemented by NetworkServerTestSetup.

    The problem before was that an exception was thrown during class loading time, even if the network server functionality was never required by the tests being run. With this wrapper, an exception will be thrown only if the functionality is actually required and the necessary classes are not on the classpath.
